personal.name: Ayush Goyal
personal.title: MERN Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Passionate about building scalable web applications with a focus on backend development and performance optimization

about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate MERN Stack Developer with strong foundations in building scalable web applications. Currently working at Accenture, I aim to contribute to innovative solutions in product-focused teams.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in creating robust, user-centric applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. My experience includes developing REST APIs, implementing authentication systems, and designing efficient databases. I also have a solid grasp of Data Structures and Algorithms, helping me write optimized code and solve complex programming problems.

services.title: React Development
services.description: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces using React and modern JavaScript.

services.title: Node.js Backend
services.description: Developing scalable APIs and backend systems with Express.js.

services.title: MongoDB Database
services.description: Designing optimized schemas and implementing secure data storage solutions.

services.title: Authentication & Security
services.description: Implementing OTP flows, JWT authentication, and role-based access control.

services.title: DSA & Problem Solving
services.description: Solving complex problems with efficient algorithms and clean code.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed a full-stack application using the MERN stack as part of internal technical training and contributed to enterprise-grade development practices.
achievements: Completed training and acquired hands-on experience building a full-stack MERN application.
Collaborated with a team of developers to deliver modular, maintainable code under tight timelines.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer Intern
experience.description: Refactored backend architecture, implemented OTP authentication, and optimized API performance.
achievements: Refactored and optimized MongoDB schemas to support new features
Implemented OTP-based signup and JWT authentication
Replaced Firebase with custom Node.js backend, reducing response time by 50ms

projects.title: FractionHive
projects.description: Developed a full-stack platform to buy and sell fractional property shares, with OTP authentication, JWT-based sessions, and Razorpay payment integration.

projects.title: Pics for All
projects.description: Built a full-stack platform for browsing and contributing high-quality photos, integrating Cloudinary AI Vision for auto-tagging and content moderation.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Created a responsive personal portfolio website to showcase projects, resume, and contact details, built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS.

contact.title: Let's work together!
contact.description: I'm actively seeking opportunities in product-based teams where I can contribute to impactful solutions and grow with modern technologies.
